file_insights.purpose: Added utility libraries for class management and animations

changes.removed: RGB-based CSS custom properties and gradient backgrounds
changes.added: HSL-based design tokens (background, foreground, primary, secondary, destructive, muted, accent, popover, card, border, input, ring, radius)

file_insights.purpose: Implements shadcn/ui color system with light and dark mode support
Utility function for conditional class name merging
file_insights.content: cn() function using clsx and tailwind-merge for safe Tailwind class composition

changes.colors: HSL variables for design tokens (border, input, ring, background, foreground, primary, secondary, destructive, muted, accent, popover, card)
changes.borderRadius: Dynamic radius based on CSS variable

patterns_discovered.description: Migrated from hardcoded RGB values to CSS custom properties using HSL color space, enabling scalable theming
Class-based dark mode strategy with separate color tokens in :root and .dark selector
shadcn/ui setup with predefined path aliases (@/components, @/lib/utils, @/ui) for clean imports
Heavy reliance on Tailwind CSS with HSL variables for maintainable, themeable designs
cn() utility function prevents Tailwind class conflicts using clsx + tailwind-merge

gotchas_discovered.description: Design tokens stored as 'number space number%' format (e.g., '222.2 47.4% 11.2%') for use with hsl(var(--primary))
gotchas_discovered.impact: Requires specific HSL format; incompatible with standard hex/rgb color definitions

gotchas_discovered.description: Dark mode requires explicit 'dark' class on html/body element; not automatic based on system preferences
borderRadius uses calculated values (e.g., calc(var(--radius) - 2px)) which may not align across component sizes
gotchas_discovered.impact: Requires careful component design to maintain visual consistency

gotchas_discovered.description: components.json defines aliases that must match tsconfig.json paths or imports will fail
gotchas_discovered.impact: Risk of broken imports if path configuration becomes misaligned

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully configured production-ready Tailwind CSS setup with shadcn/ui integration
deliverables: shadcn/ui configuration with RSC and TypeScript support
HSL-based color system with light/dark mode
Tailwind configuration with design tokens and animations
Utility function (cn) for safe class name composition
